posts.post_content:
Hello N54 folks,

Just want to let you know that Jay Kaplan (T206kid) and I  just launched a new podcast dedicated to T206 collecting: [url]www.TheMonsterPodcast.com[/url]

You can find more info at: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=262061[/url]

Thanks!

Justin
Very cool. Look forward to listening.
Very cool, just had a listen. Well done
